xwikidoc.title: Font Awesome Font
xwikidoc.content: ## General settings xwiki.iconset.type = font xwiki.iconset.ssx = IconThemes.FontAwesome.Font xwiki.iconset.render.wiki = {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} xwiki.iconset.render.html =
